Bibliographic References: PP, no. 47, pi. 9d; PPSupp, no. 58; PhV2, p. 35, no. 36 (where bibliography to date); Hist. Hell. Eth. Ill, 2, colourNon Sepcifiedill. on p. 419; Swaddling, Greek Theatre, front cover; Gogos, OJh 54, 1983, p. 68, fig. 11.
Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax scene—nocturnal love adventure; phlyax climbing up ladder to woman in window, accompanied by servant with situla and torch (cf. Vatican U 19), (b) A3r + A2, with spray; both with sticks.
